app_detail:
The Nurx app is the most convenient and affordable way to take care of your everyday healthcare needs. Our licensed medical team prescribes birth control online, PrEP for HIV prevention (plus home testing), emergency contraception, and home STI and HPV testsâ€”safely, securely, and on your schedule.

Featured in Womenâ€™s Health, NPR, InStyle, ELLE, Forbes & more!

HOW IT WORKS
1.Tell the Nurx medical team a bit about your health history.ğŸ‘©â€âš•ï¸
2.A provider reviews & prescribes medication, if appropriate.ğŸ’Š
3.We deliver to your door for free, in discreet packaging.ğŸ“­

AFFORDABLE PRICES
âœ”Get birth control starting at $15 or $0 with insurance.
âœ”99% of our PrEP patients pay $0 for the medication. PrEP is often covered by insurance, and if you donâ€™t have insurance our Truvada team will help you apply for payment assistance. 
âœ”HPV and STI tests are covered by many insurance plans, and we offer affordable pricing if you donâ€™t pay with insurance.
âœ”A medical consultation fee of just $12 includes follow-up messaging with our medical team, so you can request a prescription change or ask questions about your medication or test.
âœ”Delivery is always free.


BIRTH CONTROL
Get birth control prescribed online and delivered free. We bill insurance or you can pay by credit card. Choose from 50+ brands â€” pill, ring, patch, or shot. 

âœ”Answer questions about your health history, connect with our medical team, and upload your identification. 
âœ”We prescribe and deliver to your door.
âœ”Refills are automatic. 
âœ”Message with our medical team any time to request prescription changes or ask questions.

PrEP FOR HIV PREVENTION
Nurx is the most convenient and affordable place to access PrEP. Our PrEP Home Test Kit lets you do the required testing from home.. 

âœ”Use the app to connect with a member of our medical team.
âœ”Weâ€™ll send you a discreetly-packaged PrEP Home Test Kit that you return by mail, prepaid.
âœ”If PrEP is right for you weâ€™ll prescribe Truvada and deliver it for free.

STI HOME TEST KIT
Test yourself for common sexually transmitted infections (STIs) at home with our private and convenient STI Home Test Kits.

âœ”Choose from 1 of 3 cost-effective kits which include tests for up to 5 STIs in multiple areas of the body..
âœ”Following simple instructions, collect samples at home and send to our partner lab using a prepaid label.
âœ”Once results are in, our medical team will guide you. If you have a positive test result we will either prescribe treatment directly or connect you with in-person care.


HPV HOME TEST KIT
Skip the stirrups while protecting your health. Our HPV Home Test Kit can safely assess your risk for cervical cancer.

âœ”Answer a few questions about your health and weâ€™ll send you a home HPV test kit if appropriate.
âœ”Following simple instructions, collect your samples and return using a prepaid label.
âœ”Once results are in, our medical team will walk you through them.

EMERGENCY CONTRACEPTION
The â€œmorning after pillâ€ (Plan B or Ella) prevents pregnancy when taken up to 5 days after sex. If you need it, there's no time to waste, and the Nurx app can help.

âœ”Answer a few questions and connect with our medical team to learn next steps.
âœ”Weâ€™ll help you get emergency contraception delivered by mail or filled at a nearby pharmacy.

REAL MEDICAL PROVIDERS, PRIVATE MESSAGING
Everyone on the Nurx app medical team is certified and licensed in your state, and they undergo a rigorous vetting process. Youâ€™ll receive judgement-free care from the very best sources. We take your privacy seriously. Nurx is HIPAA compliant, and encrypts every transaction and conversation you have with us so there is no risk of breach of privacy.

Nurx is currently available in these states: AL, CA, CO, FL, GA, IA, IL, IN, MA, MI, MN, MO, NJ, NY, NC, OH, OR, PA, SC, TN, TX, UT, VA, WA, WI, District of Columbia, and to the Armed Forces. Nurx is only available to people age 13 and older.
